Name: San Siro
Review Text: Tried because of the good Google reviews. They were right, very good Pizza for a reasonable price! It's mostly a pick-up/delivery place but they also have 2 tables to sit down.

Name: San Siro
Review Text: I just love this place! Fast, super cheap and delicious. The best pizza in Amsterdam, de Pijp, without any doubts but it's a good idea to take-away because the pizzeria is actually quite small and mainly delivery-oriented. Service is friendly and quick. Highly recommended.

Name: San Siro
Review Text:
This place is the best! I eat here like twice a week. I should probably make healthier habits.
Anyway cheap, great staff, cute cat that lives in the kitchen, lots of cheese on the pizza.
Love it.

Name: San Siro
Review Text: When I arrived to Amsterdam I only had a few euros on me so I couldn't really find a place that I can just grab a bite till I walked just around the corner from the place I was staying at and I found this pizzeria. This place has great food for an affordable price, definitely a must if you're craving Italian while in Amsterdam.

Name: San Siro
Review Text: Friendly people, fast delivery, good price and above all- delicious pizza. My compliments to the chef!

Name: San Siro
Review Text: Super fast, cheap and damm good food. Lovely staff

Name: San Siro
Review Text: (Translated by Google) This is THE very best price/quality ratio in all of Amsterdam. Pizzas are top Only the shawarma could be a little better, in terms of quality BUT with what you get here for less than a tenner, you have to pay 16 Euro …

Name: San Siro
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Ordered Shawarma dish. Everything except drinks and cutlery. Waited longer than 40 minutes while they are 2.5 km from the order location. After calling back for drinks and cutlery, the cutlery was brought but still no …

Name: San Siro
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Tastiest pizza in Amsterdam. Always delivered quickly, Italian soil, super quality. We have been ordering from San Siro for 2 years and will continue! …
